name: search_a_place
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool busy_and_popular_times.
Tool description: The goal of this API  is to provide an option to use Google popular times data, until it is available via Google's API.
API description: Search for a place using the Busy and Popular Times API, similar to how a location is searched on Google, returning the popular times graph if available.

query.description: The search term for the location.
